message: I propose a fair deal. Let's split the money with me getting 90% and you getting 10%.  This way, we both get a good share and can move on with our lives.
I propose a 60/40 split.  It's a fair deal that accounts for the value diminishing faster for me in subsequent rounds.

I'm still willing to compromise, but I need a bigger share.  I'm offering 70% for me and 30% for you. This takes into account the inflation impacting our shares and ensures we both get something substantial.
